AIC.caption: query
AIC.default_val: What would you like to ask?
AIC.doc: Query to pass to the AI Agent
AIC.name: params

AID.caption: Expiration time of AI Token in seconds
AID.doc: Time in seconds for AI Token to expire if unused
AID.name: expiration_time

AIE.caption: AI Api Key
AIE.doc: Dynamic Api Key to pass to the AI (will be encrypted)
AIE.name: api_key

AIF.caption: Encrypt
AIF.doc: By default only the api_key is encrypted. If you like to encrypt everything (including json params and ai url), enable encrypt. Can be a little bit slower to execute.
AIF.name: encrypt
